content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Quiet Magpie, from The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe. This episode originally aired August 11, 1950.

(30:15) Our second story is The Trouble With Tanya, the January 7, 1964, episode from Walk Softly, Peter Troy.

Download CaseClosed751
